Script for Timothy

Room 300 – Intro-Cut

[TIMO] Timothy: Hello?
[TIMO] Timothy: ...
[TIMO] Timothy: Debra?
Debra: Timothy!
Debra: Timothy, where are you?!
[TIMO] Timothy: What is this place?
[TIMO] Timothy: Where am I?
Debra: I can't see you!
Debra: HELLO?!
Debra: ...
Debra: TIMOTHY!
Debra: ...
Debra: TIM...!!
